SENT.plain: A 71-year-old woman had arachnoid granulations found in the straight and transverse sinuses on computerized tomography (CT) and magnetic resonance imaging (MRI)
The arachnoid granulations appeared as low-density masses on CT
They gave low signals on T1-weighted MR images and high signals on T2-weighted images
Arachnoid granulations are usually of no clinical significance
They have characteristic CT and MRI manifestations and should not be mistaken for sinus thrombosis or intrasinus tumors
